wizard.name: Travel Agency UML
wizard.description: An UML model for a travel agency business leveraging class, components, use case, activity and states diagrams.

wizard.name: UML in colors
wizard.description: An UML model for a UML in colors class diagrams.

wizard.name: All mappings
wizard.description: An UML model for showing all possible diagrams and mappings available in UML Designer.

constraint.name: No extension for the Stereotype
constraint.message: The stereotype {0} must extend a meta class or another stereotype
constraint.description: All Stereotypes, should extend a meta class or another stereotype

Page.title: Overview
Page.Description: The Overview section lists all the representations that could be created ordered by viewpoints : Capture (Package hierarchy, Use case diagram…), Design (Class diagram, Activity diagram,…).

Overview.Description:
Overview
The Overview section lists all the representations that could be created ordered by viewpoints : Capture (Package hierarchy, Use case diagram…), Design (Class diagram, Activity diagram,…).

Section.name: Capture
Section.Description: To capture the actors and their interactions with the application and define the main structure of the application.

Activity.name: create new Package Hierarchy Diagram
Activity.Description: The package diagram is used to describe the structure of the system by showing the packages and their dependencies.

Activity.name: create new UseCase Diagram
Activity.Description: The use case diagram is used to describe the interaction of the user and other applications with the specified system.

Section.name: Design
Section.Description: To work on the fine grained structure and the behaviours of the application.

Activity.name: Create new Activity diagram
Activity.Description: The activity diagram is part of the behavioral diagrams in UML Standard, it is used to represent workflows of stepwise activities.

Activity.name: Create new Class diagram
Activity.Description: The class diagram is used to describe the structure of the system by showing the classes, the interfaces, their attributes, their operations and their relationships.

Activity.name: Create new Component diagram
Activity.Description: The component diagram is used to describe the structure of the system by showing the components and their connectors.

Activity.name: Create new Composite Structure diagram
Activity.Description: The composite structure diagram is used to describe the structure of the system by showing the internal structure of classes and the interfaces they used to collaborate.

Activity.name: Create new Deployment diagram
Activity.Description: The deployment diagram is used to describe the structure of the system by showing the physical deployment of artifacts on nodes.

Activity.name: Create new Sequence diagram
Activity.Description: The sequence diagram is used to show how processes operate with one another and in what order.

Activity.name: Create new State Machine diagram
Activity.Description: The statemachine diagram is used to represent the different states and transitions of a system.

Section.name: Review
Section.Description: To document, get some overview and metrics of the application (non standard representations).

Activity.name: create new Documentation table
Activity.Description: Create new documentation table

Activity.name: create new Use case cross table
Activity.Description: Create new Use Case cross table

Activity.name: create new Package containment diagram
Activity.Description: Create new Package containment diagram

Section.name: Extend
Section.Description: To extend the UML standard for example by defining profile.

Activity.name: Create new Profile diagram
Activity.Description: The profile diagram operates at the metamodel level to provide new stereotypes and profiles.

Page.title: Documentation Page
Page.Description: The Help section lists some documentation entry points.

Activity.name: Getting started
Activity.Description: How to start using the UML designer either from existing UML models or by creating a new one.

Activity.name: Reference documentation
Activity.Description: Describe in detail all the features available in UML Designer.

Activity.name: User guide
Activity.Description: Describe the key functions provided by UML-Designer

Activity.name: Developer guide
Activity.Description: UML Designer is an open source project and everyone is encouraged to get involved! There are lots of ways you can contribute.

Activity.name: Support
Activity.Description: Community Supports
